about_me.question: Can you tell us about your background?
about_me.answer: Sure! I've had quite an international upbringing. I started studying abroad from a young age, beginning in elementary school with 3 years in Canada followed by 9 years in America, which has greatly influenced my global perspective. I attended Penn State University Park, majoring in Applied Data Science. During my time at university, I discovered my passion for coding and realized its vast potential for innovation and problem-solving. I also worked as a teaching assistant in Elementary Statistics and Data Science classes, which enhanced my ability to communicate complex concepts. Alongside my studies, I gained practical experience through part-time jobs, including roles as a Barista, Server, and Security personnel, which developed my interpersonal and multitasking skills. After graduation, I immediately began working at LG Electronics, contributing to multiple projects detailed in my project section. Additionally, I conpleted ny servuce in the Korean military for 1 year and 9 months, an experience that instilled resilience and discipline.

about_me.question: Can you tell us a bit about your career path?
about_me.answer: Absolutely! I've been working as a Full Stack Developer and Data Scientist, primarily with LG Electronics. My journey has involved creating AI chatbot services, designing interfaces for cloud solutions, and handling various server administration tasks.

about_me.question: What kind of skills do you bring to the table?
about_me.answer: I’ve developed a pretty broad skill set over the years. I’m comfortable with full-stack development and have experience in languages like TypeScript, Python, and JavaScript. I also work with frameworks such as React.js and Node.js, and I enjoy diving into data with tools like MySQL, Elasticsearch, and Kibana. Beyond technical skills, I am highly adaptable and thrive in diverse environments, allowing me to quickly catch up and integrate with any team or project setup.

about_me.question: What drives you in your work?
about_me.answer: Honestly, I love tackling tough problems and coming up with creative solutions. There’s something really rewarding about improving user experiences and seeing the tangible benefits of a successful project. It’s great to work with a team that’s at the cutting edge of technology and making a real difference.

about_me.question: What’s a career milestone you’re proud of?
about_me.answer: A highlight for me was spearheading the development of an AI chatbot for LG's business cloud. It was a challenging project that involved integrating advanced language processing. Seeing how it streamlined processes and improved customer interaction was incredibly fulfilling.

projects.name: LG Business Cloud Chatbot Development
projects.explanation: Developed a chatbot for LG Business Cloud with a focus on facilitating user access to information through a responsive and dynamic chat interface, integrating real-time communication and machine learning capabilities.

projects.name: In-house LED Outsourcing Team System Development
projects.explanation: Led the development of a comprehensive business system for data management and analysis, including visualization and ETL, to support the LED outsourcing team, utilizing a wide array of data technologies.

projects.name: In-house ILO Outsourcing Quality Monitoring System
projects.explanation: Spearheaded the development of a system to extract data from various company systems, load it into GCP, and preprocess the data in BigQuery. Developed a monitoring solution to handle and resolve quality issues effectively.
